data.title: Jay Simons
data.meta_description: Jay focuses on emerging enterprise software companies and the scaling of modern SaaS business models globally. He serves on the boards of BrowserStack, HubSpot, and Zapier, and he is actively involved with investments in AlphaSense, GRIN, HeyGen, KoBold Metals, Locus, Netlify, Persona, Postman, Retool, Sentry, Twingate, Weights & Biases, VAST, and Workstream.
